name: 'Behind the Sun' (orb03, LotteZ 2021)
description:
[relisted original on this new wallet after my old wallet got compromised]

This orb has been inspired by gig posters from psychedelic rock bands from the 60s and vintage comic books. Some of these orbs are derivatives of artwork that I have designed for internationally touring bands between 2016-2021. Follow me on Twitter: @LotteZ13 , on instagram.com/lottezproductions and www.lottez.com
